functions.title: Create your BOS components by simple prompt
functions.description: By using Nearstack, you can create your BOS components by simple prompt. It will generate the code for you.

functions.title: Edit your BOS components
functions.description: You can also edit your BOS components that were generated by using Nearstack Chat bot.

functions.title: Publish your BOS components
functions.description: You can publish your BOS components to the NEAR social so that everyone can use your components.

qa.question: How does Nearstack help developers?
qa.answer: It streamlines workflows with AI-driven code suggestions, NEAR BOS integration, and a React flow interface, making development faster and more intuitive.

qa.question: What is NEAR BOS integration?
qa.answer: NEAR BOS integration lets developers use NEAR Blockchain Operating System components, making it easier to build decentralized applications with NEAR's tools.

qa.question: Who is Nearstack for?
qa.answer: Nearstack is designed for Web3 developers, particularly those building dApps on the NEAR ecosystem, and teams needing efficient, visual workflows.

qa.question: Can Nearstack be used for multi-chain development?
qa.answer: Currently, Nearstack is tailored for NEAR, but future plans may include multi-chain support to broaden its Web3 applications.

qa.question: What is Nearstack?
qa.answer: Nearstack is a development platform for building Web3 frontends on NEAR, offering tools like AI-powered code suggestions and visual component mapping.
